title: 为什么我1按f3游戏就崩溃
author: 1234rewfadszvcx

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
换一个客户端吧
F3是显示数据的
可能是数据文件不全

replies.author: Corl_A
replies.txt_content: 应该是文件数据补全，推荐使用正版客户端或者hello,mincraft客户端

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content: 请发出crash report以助确定问题

replies.author: Paris-
replies.txt_content: 或许你的f3是关闭游戏快捷键
